posts.post_title: WTB: Sweet Caporal or Piedmont Pack, T206 era (unopened)
posts.post_content:
I'm sold a couple of these the past few years and now I'm looking to buy one...

I'm looking for an UNOPENED Sweet Caporal or Piedmont pack from the T206 era, prefer one already GAI encapsulated.


Please PM me.

I will PM you shortly with some contact information for a dealer who may be able to help you.


Jantz
